tool_description: API to get the list of stocks and ETF of Euronext markets
name: Euronext - PEA - Stocks and ETFs
title: Euronext - PEA - Stocks and ETFs

api_list.name: GetMarket
api_list.description: Get an Euronext market from its code

api_list.name: GetICBByCode
api_list.description: Get an ICB by its code

api_list.name: ListAllICB

optional_parameters.name: sector
optional_parameters.description: The targeted sector

optional_parameters.name: subsectorCode
optional_parameters.description: The targeted subsector

optional_parameters.name: industry
optional_parameters.description: The targeted industry

optional_parameters.name: pageSize
optional_parameters.description: The number of items to put in page

optional_parameters.name: superSector
optional_parameters.description: The targeted super sector

optional_parameters.name: page
optional_parameters.description: The page number of CFI list

total_count.description: The total number of ICB found for your criteria

nb_stocks.description: number of stocks included in this ICB

api_list.name: ListMarkets
api_list.description: Get the list of Euronext markets with pagination

optional_parameters.name: page
optional_parameters.description: The page number of market list

optional_parameters.name: pageSize
optional_parameters.description: The number of items to put in page

api_list.name: GetCFIByCode
api_list.description: Get a CFI by its code

api_list.name: ListStocksByMarket
api_list.description: Get the list of stocks available on an Euronext market

optional_parameters.name: page
optional_parameters.description: The page number of stock list

optional_parameters.name: eligiblePEA
optional_parameters.description: Include or exclude stock eligible to PEA

optional_parameters.name: pageSize
optional_parameters.description: The number of items to put in page

optional_parameters.name: symbol
optional_parameters.description: The symbol of targeted stock

optional_parameters.name: tradingGroup
optional_parameters.description: The trading group of the targeted stocks

optional_parameters.name: subtype
optional_parameters.description: The subtype of targeted stocks

optional_parameters.name: tradingType
optional_parameters.description: The trading type of the targeted stocks

optional_parameters.name: type
optional_parameters.description: The type of targeted stocks

optional_parameters.name: icb
optional_parameters.description: The ICB code of targeted stocks

total_count.description: The total number of stock found for your criteria

icb_subsector_code.description: ICB subsector code of the stock

trading_type.description: trading type (Continuous, Double call auction, Fixing)

is_eligible_pea.description: True if the stock is eligible to PEA (France)

api_list.name: ListAllCFI
api_list.description: Get the list of CFI codes (ETFs)

optional_parameters.name: pageSize
optional_parameters.description: The number of items to put in page

optional_parameters.name: code
optional_parameters.description: The CFI code of targeted ETFs

optional_parameters.name: startsWith
optional_parameters.description: The prefix of code

optional_parameters.name: endsWith
optional_parameters.description: The suffix of code

optional_parameters.name: page
optional_parameters.description: The page number of CFI list

api_list.name: ListAllStocks
api_list.description: Get the list of stocks available on all Euronext markets

optional_parameters.name: tradingGroup
optional_parameters.description: The trading group of targeted stock

optional_parameters.name: page
optional_parameters.description: The page number of ETF list

optional_parameters.name: type
optional_parameters.description: The type of targeted stocks

optional_parameters.name: subtype
optional_parameters.description: The subtype of targeted stocks

optional_parameters.name: pageSize
optional_parameters.description: The number of items to put in page

optional_parameters.name: tradingType
optional_parameters.description: The trading type of targeted stock

optional_parameters.name: symbol
optional_parameters.description: The symbol of targeted stock

optional_parameters.name: icb
optional_parameters.description: The ICB code of targeted stock

optional_parameters.name: eligiblePEA
optional_parameters.description: Include or exclude stock eligible to PEA

optional_parameters.name: market
optional_parameters.description: The code of targeted market

api_list.name: GetStockByISIN
api_list.description: Get a stock by its ISIN code

icb_subsector_code.description: ICB subsector code of the stock

trading_type.description: trading type (Continuous, Double call auction, Fixing)

is_eligible_pea.description: True if the stock is eligible to PEA (France)

api_list.name: GetETFByISIN
api_list.description: Get an ETF by its ISIN code

is_eligible_pea.description: True if the ETF is eligible to PEA (France)

api_list.name: ListETFsByMarket
api_list.description: Get the list of ETFs available on an Euronext market

optional_parameters.name: page
optional_parameters.description: The page number of ETF list

optional_parameters.name: type
optional_parameters.description: The type of targeted ETFs

optional_parameters.name: symbol
optional_parameters.description: The symbol of targeted ETF

optional_parameters.name: pageSize
optional_parameters.description: The number of items to put in page

optional_parameters.name: cfi
optional_parameters.description: The CFI code of targeted ETFs

optional_parameters.name: eligiblePEA
optional_parameters.description: Include or exclude ETF eligible to PEA

optional_parameters.name: subtype
optional_parameters.description: The subtype of targeted ETFs

total_count.description: The total number of ETF found for your criteria

is_eligible_pea.description: True if the ETF is eligible to PEA (France)

api_list.name: ListAllETFs
api_list.description: Get the list of ETFs available on all Euronext markets

optional_parameters.description: The CFI code of targeted ETFs

optional_parameters.name: symbol
optional_parameters.description: The symbol of targeted ETF

optional_parameters.name: pageSize
optional_parameters.description: The number of items to put in page

optional_parameters.name: page
optional_parameters.description: The page number of ETF list

optional_parameters.name: type
optional_parameters.description: The type of targeted ETFs

optional_parameters.name: market
optional_parameters.description: The code of targeted market

optional_parameters.name: subtype
optional_parameters.description: The subtype of targeted ETFs

optional_parameters.name: eligiblePEA
optional_parameters.description: Include or exclude ETF eligible to PEA

total_count.description: The total number of ETF found for your criteria

is_eligible_pea.description: True if the ETF is eligible to PEA (France)
